# [Interview #699: Vericon Report - Puck, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=699#7)

#### Puck

"Is the definition of Sliver: Someone who has held a large part of the raw form of a Shard temporarily?"

#### Brandon Sanderson

"That is it"
